Getting to know us:

Name of owner: Quentin Smiley

Why did you start this business?

We started this business to provide affordable, accessible, and streamlined Internet and web services to small businesses and computer repair to everyday working citizens. We have developed a system for offering many different types of services (site development, hosting, advertising, software programming and computer repair) that are exclusively tailored to fit the needs and resources of every client.

What makes us different than other similar businesses in our area?

We have a valuable competitive edge over our local competitors based on the fact that we have streamlined all our services into the small business market. Through using many cost effective resources, we are able to offer our clients an affordable and efficient proprietary services that will meet all their related needs.

What do we like most about your community?

Our community is fair and knows a good catch when they see one. Our clients respond well to our services and we feel it our job to respond well back to them with maintaining our relationship with them.
